flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: This is a fun, simple project for pranksters, but may be complicated to get the kinks worked out...
guide.introduction_rendered: This is a fun, simple project for pranksters, but may be complicated to get the kinks worked out...
guide.summary: Are your neighbors annoying you? Well watch out neighbors, because I'm going to show you how to make a mini-trebuchet, capable of over-the-fence siege! Prepare the water balloons!
guide.title: Super Trebuchet
